document_data.name: Axe and the Minotaur
document_data.mainbody: The '''Axe and the Minotaur''' was a tavern located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: The Axe and the Minotaur was located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] of western Zhentil Keep. The tavern was found along [[Cobble Road]] near the western [[Trail Gate]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was a popular spot for [[Zhentilar]] soldiers to blow off steam. Given its proximity to the Trail Gate, agents of power serving the [[Zhentarim]] were usually snooping around here as well in order to monitor who entered the city.
